description: Lotus Lain has moved in with Dolly Leigh's ex boyfriend. Previously, Dolly turned his man cave into domesticated heaven right before he broke up with her. Now Lotus is reaping all the benefits. Attorney, Mona Wales, mediates the argument and poses unique solutions to their problem. Forget the ex, make up and fuck! The ladies aren't as willing and Mona has to use dominance to teach them a lesson. Spanking, pussy licking, ass licking, strap-on anal, dildo gag and more!
title: The Girlfriends
